abstract: China rejected Coca-Cola‘s bid to buy top local juice maker Huiyuan because it feared the U.S. multinational could abuse its position across the whole soft drinks market, an official said in remarks published on Wednesday, according to Reuters.
lead_paragraph: China rejected Coca-Cola‘s bid to buy top local juice maker Huiyuan because it feared the U.S. multinational could abuse its position across the whole soft drinks market, an official said in remarks published on Wednesday, according to Reuters.

headline.main: China Says Coca-Cola Could Have Abused Juice Deal
